item.title: U.S. federal workers hit with second wave of emails demanding job details
item.description: The Trump administration sent out a second round of emails on Friday evening demanding all federal employees summarize their work over the past week.

item.title: Trump objected to Zelenskyy's tone and body language in Oval Office clash, White House says
item.description: Zelenskyy challenged the idea that Ukraine can rely on diplomatic guarantees by Russia, whose leader Vladimir Putin launched the war in 2022.

item.title: Former New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo launches campaign for NYC mayor in bid to oust Eric Adams
item.description: Cuomo, who left his previous post because of a damning sexual harassment scandal, announced his candidacy on Saturday against fellow Democrat Mayor Er...

item.title: Judge blocks Trump order threatening funding for institutions that offer care for transgender youth
item.description: Trump's plan to pull funding from institutions that provide gender-affirming care for transgender youth will remain blocked under a federal judge's ru...

item.title: Full Video: Trump-Zelenskyy Oval Office meeting explodes into shouting match
item.description: President Donald Trump and Vice President JD Vance argued with Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy, with Vance accusing Zelenskyy of disrespect.
